remarks: The metric induced by a pseudometric is a full-fledged metric on the equivalence classes of the metric identification.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
statement:
pstmval.1 $e |- .~ = ( ~Met ` D ) $.
pstmxmet $p |- ( D e. ( PsMet ` X ) -> ( pstoMet ` D ) e. ( *Met ` ( X /. .~ ) ) ) $.
